languages.text: "Верный слуга Императора, который не утратил воли к борьбе даже в этой непроглядной мгле и собрал сопротивление — тех, кто может держать в руках оружие и не согласен с участью игрушки для поганых ксеносов. Средь мириада тварей без души, воли и храбрости, что населяют эти казематы, он и его помощники выискивают истовых имперцев и готовят их к борьбе с ксеносами".

traits.locale_text: "Верный слуга Императора, который не утратил воли к борьбе даже в этой непроглядной мгле и собрал сопротивление — тех, кто может держать в руках оружие и не согласен с участью игрушки для поганых ксеносов. Средь мириада тварей без души, воли и храбрости, что населяют эти казематы, он и его помощники выискивают истовых имперцев и готовят их к борьбе с ксеносами".

languages.text: "A loyal servant of the Emperor who has not lost the will to fight even in this impenetrable gloom. He has mustered a resistance, everyone who can hold a weapon and refuses to accept the fate of a toy in the clutches of vile xenos. The dwellers of these dungeons are myriad, and most are lacking in soul, courage, or willpower. The Commissar and his associates seek out the true champions of the Imperium among them and prepare those people for the battle against the xenos."
languages.original_text: "Верный слуга Императора, который не утратил воли к борьбе даже в этой непроглядной мгле и собрал сопротивление — тех, кто может держать в руках оружие и не согласен с участью игрушки для поганых ксеносов. Средь мириада тварей без души, воли и храбрости, что населяют эти казематы, он и его помощники выискивают истовых имперцев и готовят их к борьбе с ксеносами".

He has mustered a resistance — everyone who can hold a weapon and refuses to accept the fate of a toy in the clutches of vile xenos. The dwellers of these dungeons are myriad, and most are without soul, courage, or strength of will. The Commissar and his associates seek out the true champions of the Imperium among them and prepare those people for the battle against the xenos."

languages.text: 「皇帝の忠臣は、この不可解な暗黒の中でも戦意を失うことなく、抵抗勢力を組織した。武器を持ち、下劣な異種族の道具となる運命を拒絶することができる者たちだ。この地下牢には住人が無数にいるが、そのほとんどは魂も勇気も意志の力もない。コミッサーとその仲間たちは、彼らの中から帝国の真の戦士を探し出し、異種族との戦いに備えている。」
languages.original_text: "A loyal servant of the Emperor who has not lost the will to fight even in this impenetrable gloom. He has mustered a resistance, everyone who can hold a weapon and refuses to accept the fate of a toy in the clutches of vile xenos. The dwellers of these dungeons are myriad, and most are lacking in soul, courage, or willpower. The Commissar and his associates seek out the true champions of the Imperium among them and prepare those people for the battle against the xenos."

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝の忠臣は、この不可解な暗黒の中でも戦意を失うことなく、抵抗勢力を組織した。武器を持ち、下劣な異種族の道具となる運命を拒絶することができる者たちだ。この地下牢には住人が無数にいるが、そのほとんどは魂も勇気も意志の力もない。コミッサーとその仲間たちは、彼らの中から帝国の真の戦士を探し出し、異種族との戦いに備えている。」

languages.text: “他是帝皇忠诚的仆人，即便是在这暗无天日的黑暗之中，也没有失去战斗的意志。他集结了一批反抗军，所有拒绝沦为异形玩物的人都拿起了武器。尽管这座城市有着不计其数的居民，但绝大部分人都缺乏灵魂、勇气与意志。政委和他的伙伴负责寻找真正愿意捍卫帝国的人，让这些人做好与异形开战的准备。”
languages.original_text: "A loyal servant of the Emperor who has not lost the will to fight even in this impenetrable gloom. He has mustered a resistance, everyone who can hold a weapon and refuses to accept the fate of a toy in the clutches of vile xenos. The dwellers of these dungeons are myriad, and most are lacking in soul, courage, or willpower. The Commissar and his associates seek out the true champions of the Imperium among them and prepare those people for the battle against the xenos."

traits.locale_text: “他是帝皇忠诚的仆人，即便是在这暗无天日的黑暗之中，也没有失去战斗的意志。他集结了一批反抗军，所有拒绝沦为异形玩物的人都拿起了武器。尽管这座城市有着不计其数的居民，但绝大部分人都缺乏灵魂、勇气与意志。政委和他的伙伴负责寻找真正愿意捍卫帝国的人，让这些人做好与异形开战的准备。”

languages.text: «Un leal sirviente del Emperador que no ha perdido la voluntad de luchar incluso en esta impenetrable penumbra. Ha creado una resistencia para todos los que pueden empuñar un arma y se niegan a aceptar el destino de ser juguetes en las garras de los despreciables xenos. Los moradores de estas mazmorras son innumerables, y la mayoría carecen de la fuerza de espíritu, valor o voluntad necesarias. El Comisario y sus socios buscan entre ellos a los verdaderos campeones del Imperium y los preparan para la batalla contra los xenos».
languages.original_text: "A loyal servant of the Emperor who has not lost the will to fight even in this impenetrable gloom. He has mustered a resistance, everyone who can hold a weapon and refuses to accept the fate of a toy in the clutches of vile xenos. The dwellers of these dungeons are myriad, and most are lacking in soul, courage, or willpower. The Commissar and his associates seek out the true champions of the Imperium among them and prepare those people for the battle against the xenos."

traits.locale_text: «Un leal sirviente del Emperador que no ha perdido la voluntad de luchar incluso en esta impenetrable penumbra. Ha creado una resistencia para todos los que pueden empuñar un arma y se niegan a aceptar el destino de ser juguetes en las garras de los despreciables xenos. Los moradores de estas mazmorras son innumerables, y la mayoría carecen de la fuerza de espíritu, valor o voluntad necesarias. El Comisario y sus socios buscan entre ellos a los verdaderos campeones del Imperium y los preparan para la batalla contra los xenos».

languages.text: "Ein treuer Diener des Imperators, der selbst in dieser undurchdringlichen Düsternis seinen Kampfgeist nicht verloren hat. Er hat einen Widerstand organisiert. Jeder, der eine Waffe halten kann und nicht bereit ist, einfach kampflos als Spielzeug in den Klauen widerwärtiger Xenos zu enden. Die Bewohner dieser Verliese sind vielfältig, und den meisten fehlt es an Seele, Mut oder Willenskraft. Der Kommissar und seine Gruppe suchen unter ihnen die wahren Champions des Imperiums und bereiten sie auf den Kampf gegen die Xenos vor."
languages.original_text: "A loyal servant of the Emperor who has not lost the will to fight even in this impenetrable gloom. He has mustered a resistance, everyone who can hold a weapon and refuses to accept the fate of a toy in the clutches of vile xenos. The dwellers of these dungeons are myriad, and most are lacking in soul, courage, or willpower. The Commissar and his associates seek out the true champions of the Imperium among them and prepare those people for the battle against the xenos."

traits.locale_text: "Ein treuer Diener des Imperators, der selbst in dieser undurchdringlichen Düsternis seinen Kampfgeist nicht verloren hat. Er hat einen Widerstand organisiert. Jeder, der eine Waffe halten kann und nicht bereit ist, einfach kampflos als Spielzeug in den Klauen widerwärtiger Xenos zu enden. Die Bewohner dieser Verliese sind vielfältig, und den meisten fehlt es an Seele, Mut oder Willenskraft. Der Kommissar und seine Gruppe suchen unter ihnen die wahren Champions des Imperiums und bereiten sie auf den Kampf gegen die Xenos vor."

languages.text: « Un serviteur loyal de l'Empereur qui n'a pas encore perdu la volonté de se battre malgré les ténèbres impénétrables qui l'entourent. Il a formé un mouvement de résistance avec tous ceux qui pouvaient tenir une arme et qui refusaient de finir comme des jouets entre les griffes des perfides xénos. Ces donjons grouillent de myriades de prisonniers, mais rares sont ceux qui ont le courage ou la volonté de lutter. Le commissaire et ses associés se sont donné pour mission de dénicher les véritables champions de l'Imperium parmi eux, et de les préparer à affronter les xénos. »
languages.original_text: "A loyal servant of the Emperor who has not lost the will to fight even in this impenetrable gloom. He has mustered a resistance, everyone who can hold a weapon and refuses to accept the fate of a toy in the clutches of vile xenos. The dwellers of these dungeons are myriad, and most are lacking in soul, courage, or willpower. The Commissar and his associates seek out the true champions of the Imperium among them and prepare those people for the battle against the xenos."

Le commissaire et ses associés se sont donné pour mission de dénicher les véritables champions de l'Imperium parmi eux, et de les préparer à affronter les xénos. »

languages.text: "İmparator'un sadık hizmetkârlarından biri. Bu kasvetli, zifirî karanlıkta bile savaşma azmini yitirmemiş. Direniş için adam toplamış: Eli silah tutan ve adi zenoların elinde oyuncak olmayı reddeden herkes onunla. Bu zindanların sakinleri saymakla bitmez ancak çoğunun ruhu ölmüş, cesareti kırılmış, azmi kalmamış. Komiser ve adamları, bunların arasında İmparatorluk'un gerçek müdafilerini arayıp zenolarla savaşmaya hazırlıyor."
languages.original_text: "A loyal servant of the Emperor who has not lost the will to fight even in this impenetrable gloom. He has mustered a resistance, everyone who can hold a weapon and refuses to accept the fate of a toy in the clutches of vile xenos. The dwellers of these dungeons are myriad, and most are lacking in soul, courage, or willpower. The Commissar and his associates seek out the true champions of the Imperium among them and prepare those people for the battle against the xenos."
